thread.title: Financial advice standards to be improved
thread.title_full: Financial advice standards to be improved

author: Drew Cratchley
title: Financial advice standards to be improved
text:
Drew Cratchley FINANCIAL advisers will be required to hold a degree and continually undergo professional development under new laws aimed at preventing another scandal in the industry.
THE federal government's response to the Murray inquiry into Australia's financial system includes proposed new legislation aimed at raising the ethical, educational and professional standards of a financial advice industry tarnished by a recent history of poor practices.
 Financial advice standards to be improved
